WorkItem.Description: On my system, Kaspersky antivirus has found a trojan in given sample pdf by PDFMerger. I request people downloading it to be aware of this fact and check through antivirus.

Comments.Message: Thank you for your reminding. By the way, can I [create a PDF document](http://www.rasteredge.com/how-to/vb-net-imaging/pdf-creating/) by myself as the sample pdf?
